mapper.select: select id,POST_SEQ_CODE AS code,POST_SEQ_NAME AS name, group_id as groupId ,parent_id as parentId from mp_post_seq where group_id = #{groupId}
SELECT count(*) from mp_post where post_seq_id = #{id}
select (case when exists (select * from mp_post_seq where parent_id = #{id} ) then 0 else 1 end) as isLeaf
SELECT count(*) from mp_post_seq where (#{id} is null or id != #{id}) and post_seq_code = #{postSeqCode}
SELECT count(*) from mp_post_seq where (#{id} is null or id != #{id}) and post_seq_name = #{postSeqName}
